note_text: Laparoscopic cholecystectomy performed for acute cholecystitis. Four-port technique used. Gallbladder dissected from liver bed. Cystic duct and artery clipped and divided. Specimen extracted via umbilical port.
Open appendectomy for perforated appendicitis. McBurney incision. Appendix found gangrenous with perforation. Mesoappendix divided. Appendiceal stump inverted and buried. Peritoneal lavage performed.
Arthroscopic anterior cruciate ligament reconstruction using bone-patellar tendon-bone autograft. Tibial and femoral tunnels created. Graft passed and secured with interference screws.
Cesarean section delivery for failure to progress. Low transverse uterine incision. Live female infant delivered. Placenta manually removed. Uterus closed in two layers.
Coronary artery bypass grafting x3. Left internal mammary to LAD. Saphenous vein grafts to OM1 and RCA. Cardiopulmonary bypass time 95 minutes.
